name: Kuebiko (Erizux)
description:
In Kuebiko you are the king of the birds and you have to defend your castle from the scarecrows, choose your cards, and use them to build towers, but be quick, because the cards float in the river and cannot stop moving.

It is played using the mouse, drag and drop the cards on the stage to place towers.

This game was created by Adam Morton and Erizux for Mini jam 99.

Adam Morton's page: https://adammortonmusic.com/
